-- This script was generated by a beta version of the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE public.employee_confirms
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    employee_id integer,
    employer_id integer,
    is_confirmed boolean,
    confirmed_date date,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employees
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    first_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employers
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    location_id integer,
    company_name character varying(100),
    web_address character varying(50),
    phone_number character varying(20),
    create_date date,
    search_status boolean,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employers_roles
(
    employers_id integer NOT NULL,
    roles_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 )
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_advertisements
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    role_id integer,
    employer_id integer,
    way_of_working_id integer,
    experience character varying(20),
    salary double precision,
    description text,
    create_date date,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_candidates
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    location_id integer,
    identification_no character varying(11) NOT NULL,
    first_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    phone_number character varying(15) NOT NULL,
    birth_date date NOT NULL,
    create_date date,
    search_status boolean,
    identification_type character varying(30),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_candidates_roles
(
    job_candidates_id integer NOT NULL,
    roles_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 )
);

CREATE TABLE public.locations
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    country_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    city_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    region_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    street_address text,
    postal_code character varying(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.operation_claims
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.operation_claims_users
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    operation_claim_id integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.roles
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    role_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.users
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    email character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    password_hash text NOT NULL,
    password_salt text NOT NULL,
    status boolean NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.verification_codes
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    user_id integer,
    code character varying(30),
    create_date date,
    is_verifed boolean,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.way_of_workings
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE public.employee_confirms
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employee_id)
    REFERENCES public.employees (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employee_confirms
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employer_id)
    REFERENCES public.employers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employees
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (location_id)
    REFERENCES public.locations (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employers_roles
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employers_id)
    REFERENCES public.employers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employers_roles
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (roles_id)
    REFERENCES public.roles (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisements
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employer_id)
    REFERENCES public.employers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisements
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (role_id)
    REFERENCES public.roles (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisements
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (way_of_working_id)
    REFERENCES public.way_of_workings (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_candidates
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_candidates
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (location_id)
    REFERENCES public.locations (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_candidates_roles
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_candidates_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_candidates (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_candidates_roles
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (roles_id)
    REFERENCES public.roles (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verification_codes
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;

END;
